body.p:
Bowling Green Ky March 25 1861
To his Excellency B Mcgoffin Govr of Ky
Frankfort Ky
Dear Sir

The petition for the pardon of Rufus Jones written by Jos R Underwood & signed by himself & others was Shown to me last week & I intended to day but being county court day was very Busy & did not have an of doing so till late in the evening, led to do it & it had been sent If the name of your humble servt to said petition would have any influence (though small I know it will be) I authorise you to consider it there

Very Respctfully yours
P J Potter
